analysis.description:
OptionToken.fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#322-325) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	require(bool)(lib.delegatecall(msg.data)) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#324-325)

Reentrancy in Protocol.bid (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#555-619):
	External calls:
	- time = now + _timePreference(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#567-568)
	- _grantReward(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#573-574)
	- hasFunds = usdERC20.balanceOf(msg.sender) >= givGet && usdERC20.allowance(msg.sender,this) >= givGet (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#585-586)
	- result = msg.sender.call.value(amount)(RECEIVE_ETH,_series,amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#590-592)
	- require(bool)(usdERC20.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,givGet)) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#593-594)
	- require(bool)(usdERC20.transfer(msg.sender,givGet)) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#605)
	- result = msg.sender.call(RECEIVE_USD,_series,givGet) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#610)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#588-589)
	- result = msg.sender.call.value(amount)(RECEIVE_ETH,_series,amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#590-592)
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - amount) (/unique_chucks/12/0xb4933b15b21924af2c18012c4da78b182f060107.sol#614-616)
	State variables written after the call(s):
